extensionDescription.message: Tha LinkedIn Container a’ cumail na nì thu air LinkedIn fa leth on chòrr dhen ghnìomhachd air loidhne agad airson LinkedIn a chumail o bhith gad thracadh taobh a-muigh làrach-lìn LinkedIn le briosgaidean threas-phàrtaidhean.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: ’S urrainn dha LinkedIn do thracadh air an làrach seo a-nis. Gus an làrach seo a thoirt air falbh o LinkedIn Container, tagh “Làraichean ceadaichte ann am LinkedIn Container” is thoir air falbh on liosta e.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Air LinkedIn agus làraichean ann an crò LinkedIn Container
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Nochdaidh an ìomhaigheag seo ann am bàr-seòlaidh Firefox nuair a thadhlas tu air làraichean a tha aig LinkedIn no làraichean a chuir thu ri LinkedIn Container.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened into LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Feumaidh na làraichean seo cothrom air do dhearbh-aithne LinkedIn (no fiosrachadh cò thusa) mus obraich iad. Tha seo a’ ciallachadh cuideachd gun urrainn dha LinkedIn rud sam bith a thracadh a nì thu air na làraichean seo.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on LinkedIn.

notOnLinkedInHeader.message: Chan eil $URL$ ann am LinkedIn Container.
notOnLinkedInHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

notOnLinkedInText.message: Tha an làrach seo taobh a-muigh LinkedIn Container. Bidh e nas dorra dha LinkedIn do thracadh air feadh an lìn air an dòigh seo.
notOnLinkedInText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a LinkedIn website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE LinkedIn Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.message: Chan eil an làrach seo am broinn LinkedIn Container.
onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "LinkedIn Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: Nì LinkedIn tracadh air do bhrasadh fada o LinkedIn.com fhèin. Mar eisimpleir, ma chleachdas tu putanan LinkedIn Like agus Share, bidh fios aca càit an robh thu – fiù air duilleagan nach duirt thu gur toil leat iad no feadhainn nach do cho-roinn thu.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: Cruthaichidh LinkedIn Container crìoch eadar làraichean LinkedIn is an còrr dhen eadar-lìon airson ’s gum bi e nas dorra dha LinkedIn do thracadh air loidhne.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Air LinkedIn agus làraichean ann an crò LinkedIn Container
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Nochdaidh an ìomhaigheag seo ann am bàr-seòlaidh Firefox nuair a thadhlas tu air làraichean mar LinkedIn.com a tha ann an crò LinkedIn Container.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Feumaidh na làraichean seo cothrom air do dhearbh-aithne LinkedIn (no fiosrachadh cò thusa) mus obraich iad. Tha seo a’ ciallachadh cuideachd gun urrainn dha LinkedIn rud sam bith a thracadh a nì thu air na làraichean seo.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "LinkedIn Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Fiù mur eil thu air LinkedIn, ’s urrainn dha LinkedIn do thracadh air loidhne. Bidh tracaichean ann am putanan a bheir comas dhut rudan a phostadh air LinkedIn no clàradh a-steach gu làraichean-lìn a' cleachdadh a’ chunntais LinkedIn agad. Bacaidh LinkedIn Container na tracaichean seo agus nochdaidh am feansa airson sealltainn dhut gun deach tracaichean a bhacadh.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Tha an dealbh seo a’ sealltainn mar a nochdas ìomhaigheag feansa LinkedIn Container ri taobh putan Like le LinkedIn air duilleagan.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.message: A’ clàradh a-steach le LinkedIn air làraichean eile
onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Airson clàradh a-steach leis a’ chunntas LinkedIn air làraichean eile, feumaidh tu an leigeil a-steach dhan chrò. Briog air an fheansa ’s tagh “Ceadaich an làrach ann am LinkedIn Container” aig a’ bhonn.
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Tha an dealbh seo a’ mìneachadh mar a nochdas am putan airson làrach a chur ri LinkedIn Container air a’ phanail.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: Leigidh seo leat clàradh a-steach leis a’ chunntas LinkedIn agad ach bheir e comas dha LinkedIn do ghnìomhachd a thracadh air an làrach ud.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the LinkedIn container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.message: Tadhail air “Mar a dh’obraicheas LinkedIn Container”
btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How LinkedIn Container Works" link

no-trackers-subhead.message: Cha do mhothaich sinn do thracaiche LinkedIn sam bith

no-trackers-p1.message: Cha do mhothaich LinkedIn Container do thracaiche LinkedIn sam bith air an duilleag seo. Ge-tà, dh’fhaoidte gu bheil tracaichean eile air an duilleag fhathast.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about LinkedIn Container.

how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the LinkedIn Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking LinkedIn trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: Tha tracaichean sna putanan LinkedIn a nochdas air làraichean seopadaireachd, naidheachdan is feadhainn eile agus innsidh iad dha LinkedIn càit an robh thu air an lìon. Fiù mur an cleachd thu na putanan ud airson rud a cho-roinneadh no innse gur toil leat rud, cruinnichidh na tracaichean seo dàta mun bhrabhsadh a nì thu fhathast. Bacaidh LinkedIn Container na tracaichean seo.

trackers-detected-p2.message: Bacaidh LinkedIn Container na tracaichean seo. Ge-tà, ma bhriogas tu air gin dhe na putanan seo, bheir sin comas dha LinkedIn do thracadh.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-added-subhead.message: Làraichean ceadaichte ann am LinkedIn Container

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the LinkedIn Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the LinkedIn Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: Cuiridh LinkedIn Container làraichean le LinkedIn ann an crò. ’S urrainn dhut làraichean eile a leigeil a-steach dhan chrò ach bheir seo comas dha LinkedIn barrachd dhe na nì thu air loidhne a thracadh.

button-allow-site.message: Ceadaich an làrach ann am LinkedIn Container
button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the LinkedIn Container

button-remove-site.message: Thoir an làrach air falbh o LinkedIn Container
button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the LinkedIn Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: A chionn ’s gur ann le LinkedIn a tha an làrach seo, cha ghabh a thoirt air falbh o LinkedIn Container.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-subhead.message: A bheil thu airson an làrach a thoirt air falbh o LinkedIn Container?

remove-site-p1.message: Ma bheir thu air falbh an làrach seo o LinkedIn Container, chan obraich an gleus a bheir comas dhut clàradh a-steach leis a’ chunntas LinkedIn agad agus thèid briosgaidean tracadh LinkedIn a sguabadh às.

remove-site-p2.message: Ma tha thu airson clàradh a-steach leis a’ chunntas LinkedIn agad a-rithist, bidh agad ris a chur ri LinkedIn Container às ùr.

add-site-subhead.message: A bheil thu airson tracadh LinkedIn a cheadachadh air an làrach seo?

add-site-p1.message: Leigidh seo leat clàradh a-steach leis a’ chunntas LinkedIn agad ach bheir e comas dha LinkedIn sùil a chumail air na nì thu air an làrach seo.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: Chuir LinkedIn Container am putan seo à comas agus bhac e LinkedIn o bhith ’gad thracadh air an duilleag seo.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: Bhac LinkedIn Container tracaichean LinkedIn. Ma chlàraicheas tu a-steach leis a’ chunntas LinkedIn agad air an làrach seo, bidh comas aig LinkedIn do thracadh.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p1.message: A bheil thu airson cead a thoirt dha LinkedIn do thracadh an-seo?

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: Ma tha thu airson clàradh a-steach le LinkedIn, bidh comas aig LinkedIn do ghnìomhachd air an làrach seo a thracadh. Bheir sin comas dhaibh dealbh nas iomlaine fhaighinn dhe na nì thu air loidhne.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: Ma bhriogas tu am putan seo, bheir sin comas dha LinkedIn do thracadh air an làrach seo.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-email.message: Ma chleachdas tu am fìor-sheòladh puist-d agad an-seo, dh’fhaoidte gun urrainn dha LinkedIn do thracadh. Dèan briogadh airson barrachd fiosrachaidh.

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p1.message: A bheil thu airson cead a thoirt dha LinkedIn do thracadh an-seo?

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p2.message: ’S urrainn dhan làrach seo an seòladh puist-d agad a nochdadh dha LinkedIn agus bheir sin cothrom dha LinkedIn do thracadh. Cleachd seirbheis mar Firefox Relay airson am fìor-sheòladh puist-d agad a chur am falach.
